description: Winter hikes, snowshoe treks, early morning trips to the crags – whatever the day’s adventure brings, you need something water repellant, wind resistant, breathable, stretchy, and warm. The winter-weight Levon delivers. Its Wee Burly™ Double Weave moves with you and sheds light weather. Articulated patterning combines with the stretch for exceptional freedom, and the classic five-pocket design gives the pant a relaxed style that handles any landscape.
name: Arcteryx Levon Winter Weight Pants, Reg - Mens
